name: Warsaw Demonstrations
description:
It's a mash between Pacman and Snake!
Two demonstrations went on streets and they're not happy!

Control groups using A/D and Left/Right... or Dance Pad!

I might update it sometime soon and add more game modes.
I'm thinking about doing 1 vs bot, 2 coop vs bots, 2 vs 2 or FFA for as many players as possible. Maybe some variations in maps too?
It's not hard I got everything implemented already, except bots, and all I need to do is game menu.

It has potential to be decent party game!

Watch Timelapse from Game Jam:
